3: The tactical terminal has been activated.
There was a 0.03-second flicker just above the terminal, but it disappeared immediately...
No response from the terminal, Lee?
The tactical terminal well functions and no anomalies were detected.
...Enemies coming?
No response from the Corrupted detected!
But I sense a real and murderous feeling all over my body...
...Stay put.
Where would the enemies be...
Wait, I figured it out.
The murderous feeling is gone. What did you do, Lee?
I closed the tactical terminal for now. Turns out the memory intends to attack us.
But she won't be able to touch us for real... right?
The murderous feeling was so real, like a cut on the skin.
It's hard to imagine that such a feeling comes from a memory.

2: Seems like it's a powerful one.
4: But it shouldn't be able to affect us.

3: In this case, there's no way to properly test the memory. Things are getting a bit tricky.
In this case, there's no way to properly test the memory. Things are getting a bit tricky.
Commandant, do you have any idea?
...I see.
Well, what's going on? I'm right in a dream of donuts!
You won't get away with it if you're waking me up just for some boring little stuff!
Well, what's this feeling...
I see. Huh, it was the commandant's idea, right? You've found the right person this time.
Aife, is that you?
Cottie... it's been a while.
You're still the same as before, ready to attack others at any time, you cross sniper.
Isn't it normal to be on alert and take a defensive stance with weapons at all times?
Are you calling sniping defense? Forget it, take a good look at the person behind.
See? These are not your enemies.
I knew it. Our battles... won't just end up like this.
Hmph, after all, 'that guy' has barely won my approval. I could never be wrong about others!
Then I got it.
The timing is just right. Test for memory integrity and corruption completed. Ready for recycling.
Sergeants are always at their disposal. Whatever the order is, consider it done.
Commandant... I haven't heard of it in a while.
So, all the memory data recycling is completed.
Hey! Well... Commandant!
I don't care if you're the commandant of the former Moe Army, our commandant... anyway, listen to me!
Heads up! I haven't been waiting for someone... or being excited to see someone...
... like having a lot of delicious donuts!
But! If you dare to wake me up from a sweet dream of donuts, you'd have to take responsibility for it!
I don't care what enemies you're up against, or what damn Punishing Virus, I just want you to win! Got it?
And, I'm not looking forward to those words... you know?
Wel... Hey, don't you have something to say since I offered my help as a powerful marshal?
Hmph, good luck. I'll be waiting.
...Is it over?
Seems like the commandant has made an incredible pact.
It's a heavy inheritance.
That's true.
I'm sure we will, Commandant.
